title: ASUS TUF Gaming A15 15.6" Gaming Laptop - Graphite Black (AMD Ryzen 5 7535HS/16GB RAM/1TB SSD/GeForce RTX 3050)
description: Dominate every game with the ASUS TUF A15 15.6-inch gaming laptop. Powered by an AMD Ryzen 5 7535HS processor and 16GB DDR5 RAM, it delivers lightning-fast performance, seamless multitasking, and smooth gameplay. Built to last, it meets the rigorous MIL-STD-810H military standard, ensuring durability against drops, vibrations, humidity, and extreme temperatures.
features: 180W AC Adapter
AMD Ryzen 5 7535HS (up to 4.55 GHz) processor and 16GB DDR5 RAM deliver exceptional speed and multitasking efficiency
1TB solid state drive offers lightning-fast read and write speeds and ample storage for games, apps, and media
NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 4GB GDDR6 GPU at 75W with Dynamic Boost enables silky smooth graphics, delivering enhanced visuals and fluid gameplay
15.6-inch screen with 1920 x 1080 resolution and 144Hz refresh rate offers crisp visuals and ultra-smooth gameplay
Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) (dual band) 2 x 2 and Bluetooth 5.3 wireless card provide reliable options for wireless connectivity
One RJ45 LAN port, three USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, one USB Type C with DisplayPort support, one HDMI 2.1 TMDS, and one 3.5mm combo audio jack offers plenty of options to connect external devices
Built to meet the durable MIL-STD-810H military standard to withstands drops, vibrations, humidity, and extreme temperatures
Preinstalled with Windows 11 Home operating system that features easy user interface and offers improved performance and enhanced security
summary: Unleash your gaming potential with the ASUS TUF A15 15.6-inch gaming laptop, featuring a powerful AMD Ryzen 5 7535HS processor, 16GB DDR5 RAM, and a lightning-fast 1TB SSD for seamless multitasking and ample storage. Enjoy stunning visuals and smooth gameplay with the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 GPU and a 144Hz display, all housed in a rugged design that meets military durability standards. Experience reliable connectivity with Wi-Fi 6 and a variety of ports, all powered by Windows 11 for enhanced performance and security.
tagline: Conquer every challenge with ASUS TUF Gaming A15.
highlights: Exceptional speed with AMD Ryzen 5 7535HS processor
Seamless multitasking powered by 16GB DDR5 RAM
Lightning-fast 1TB SSD storage for all your games
Stunning visuals with NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 GPU
Crisp 15.6-inch display at 144Hz refresh rate
Reliable Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity
Versatile ports for all your external devices
Built to withstand tough conditions with MIL-STD-810H durability
Preinstalled Windows 11 for enhanced performance and security.

It features the Intel Core i9-14900HX processor, 32GB of RAM, a 1TB SSD, and an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 GPU with 8GB GDDR6. title: Apple MacBook Air 13.6" w/ Touch ID (2025) - Midnight (Apple M4 / 16GB RAM / 256GB SSD) - English
description: The 13-inch MacBook Air with the M4 chip lets you fly through work and play. With Apple Intelligence,1 a brilliant Liquid Retina display, up to 18 hours of battery life,2 and a strikingly thin and light design, it’s built to last and can take on just about anything, anywhere.

Up to 18 hours of battery life—MacBook Air delivers the same amazing performance whether it’s running on battery or plugged in2
Superlight and less than half an inch thin, MacBook Air fits easily into your bag—and your on-the-go lifestyle
The 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display supports one billion colours.3 Photos and videos pop with rich contrast and sharp detail, and text appears supercrisp

All your favourites run lightning fast in macOS, including Microsoft 365, Adobe Creative Cloud and Google Workspace4

Mac works like magic with your other Apple devices. View and control what’s on your iPhone from your Mac with iPhone Mirroring5. Copy something on iPhone and paste it on Mac. Send texts with Messages or use your Mac to make and answer FaceTime calls6
summary: Experience unparalleled performance with the 13-inch MacBook Air powered by the M4 chip, designed for both work and play. Enjoy up to 18 hours of battery life, a stunning Liquid Retina display that supports one billion colors, and seamless integration with your Apple devices. Ultra-light and incredibly thin, this laptop is perfect for your on-the-go lifestyle, ensuring you stay productive and entertained anywhere you are.
